values: （人体或动物的）背部；背；背面；后面；（椅子等的）靠背；后部；后卫；脊柱；腰背；脊梁骨；（书等的）最后几页
在后；向后；回原处；回到原来位置；复原；恢复原状；在过去；以前；在远处；向后倾斜；在背后；向背面；倒退；朝反方向
支持；赞成；赞同；倒车；使后退；倒退；帮助；为…提供资金；投资；预测…获胜并下注；给…装背衬；背靠着；背对；加强；增援；背书；担保；证实；证明；伴奏；（用某物）在…背后加固
后部的；背面的；背后的；后面的；向后的；远离中心的；偏僻的；边远的；过去的；以前的；旧时的；落后的；逆行的；相反的；舌后的；后位的；支持的；复原的；复活的；恢复的；拖欠的；到期未付的

synonym.mean: 后面；背部；靠背；足球等的后卫；书报等的末尾
以前；向后地；来回地；上溯

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 向后的；反向的；发展迟缓的
支持；使后退（back的过去分词）
无背的；无靠背的；无后盾的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 含义广泛，多指在道义上或物质上支持某人，也可指对某项事业的支持。
侧重指连续不断的支持。
通常指对论点、行动、事业等的强有力支持。
既可指积极努力对陷入困境者的支持，也可指给某人在行动、道义或信仰上的支持。
多指通过写文章或发表演说等来支持或拥护，往往暗示提倡某事或为某事辩护。
指成对并且分前后的东西的“后面的”。
可用于人或物，指向后的，落后的或迟钝的。
指一物同它物相对的位置或场所。
作为副词或形容词时，强调所修饰物的位置以及动作运动方向。

word_group.brief_definition: 回顾过去, 追忆；遭遇挫折；中途受阻
带回；唤起（回忆）；使忆起；恢复；重新使用
袖手旁观, 不采取行动, 不参与
回来, 回到, 恢复到
回来, 追溯到, 回顾
放回原处；推迟；拨慢(钟表指针)
收回；同意退货；使回忆起

bilingual.source: He has a tattoo on his back.
bilingual.target: 他在后背上有一个纹身。

bilingual.source: He likes to pat people on the back for encouragement.
bilingual.target: 他喜欢在后背上拍一拍表示鼓励。

bilingual.source: Now a health official (官员) in Australia says a pat (拍打) on the back would be better.
bilingual.target: 现在，澳大利亚一名卫生官员表示拍打后背会更好。

bilingual.source: I fell down the stairs and injured my back.
bilingual.target: 我从楼梯上摔下来，伤了后背。

bilingual.source: Back door back pain back wall backing bad eyesight band
bilingual.target: 乐队后门后背疼痛后墙帮助，支持视力不好
人们的脚蹬着她的后背.

bilingual.source: She had something the matter with her back.
The tape must b horizontal at the back.
bilingual.target: 在后背处卷尺保持水平.

list.abstract: Back，英[bæk]，美[bæk]，英语单词。可以用作名词、动词、形容词和副词，做名词时，指后部，末尾；做形容词时，指向后的，相反的；做副词时，指回到原处，恢复原状。英语短语有：pay back译为报复。例句：She decided to go back to the store and give the cashier (收银员) a five-dollar bill.翻译她决定回到商店，给收银员一张五美元的钞票。 复数：backs，第三人称单数：backs，现在分词：backing，过去式：backed，过去分词：backed。

yingyinNormal.en: This was supposed to last her a month, but they didn't take into account the square footage of her back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 本来够她用一个月的，但医生没考虑到她后背的面积。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you think it...? Oh, God. She has an implant in her back. I can track it from the control room.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得她…噢，天啊，她的后背有植入物，我可以从主控室里追踪她。

yingyinNormal.en: They tried to put him down, but he was under my command, so I took the blame. Two scars across my back as a reward.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们想杀了他，但是他是我的手下，所以我挡下了。我后背上的伤疤就当是纪念了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm coming back. I'm happy to come back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会回去的，我很开心能回去。

yingyinNormal.en: How do I get it back in?
You want me to put it back?

yingyinNormal.zh: 嗨 哈蒂小姐 我们回来了

yingyinNormal.en: Again I must go back to, how?

exam_freq_info.chinese: 后部; 后面的; 向后

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 向后地；往回地；倒回原处地；反向地；回溯；每况愈下地
n. 反馈的信息；反馈；反馈噪音；回授
adj. 向后的；智力迟钝的；羞怯的；犹豫的；线后的；落后的；倒退的

word_family.mean: n. 背；背部；背面；反面；后面；卫；剑桥大学后园；背后；椅背；船体

sense_info_list.en: in or to or toward a former location

examination_example.sentence: A move <highlight>back</highlight> to self-sufficiency, the argument goes, would boost the farming industry, political sovereignty and even the nation's health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种观点认为，恢复自给自足将促进农业、政治主权甚至国家健康。

examination_example.sentence: You wish that you could turn <highlight>back</highlight> the clock and start over.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你希望时光倒流，重新开始。

examination_example.sentence: Do your best to engage coworkers in a genuine, <highlight>back</highlight>-and-forth conversation, rather than prioritizing your own thoughts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽你最大的努力让同事参与到真诚的、来回的对话中，而不是优先考虑你自己的想法。

examination_example.sentence: Yet science has a cultural history, too, with roots going <highlight>back</highlight> to the dawn of civilization.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，科学也有一段文化史，其根源可以追溯到文明的开端。

examination_example.sentence: Looking <highlight>back</highlight>, he is struck that his parents could provide a comfortable life for their children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 回忆过去，他很惊讶他的父母能为他们的孩子提供舒适的生活。

examination_example.sentence: "Sometime in the future," the paper's publisher said <highlight>back</highlight> in 2010.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该报的出版商早在2010年就说过:“在未来的某个时候”。

sense_info_list.zh: 后部; 后面的; 向后

examination_example.sentence: We know that a typical infant will instinctively gaze into its mother's eyes, and she will look <highlight>back</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们知道，典型的婴儿会本能地凝视母亲的眼睛，而母亲会回头看。

examination_example.sentence: Rather than pulling students <highlight>back</highlight>, a gap year pushes them ahead by preparing them for independence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 间隔年并没有让学生后退，而是通过让他们为独立做准备来推动他们前进。

examination_example.sentence: It's like the teacher who breaks up the troublemakers in the <highlight>back</highlight> row by pairing them with better-behaved classmates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像老师把后排的捣蛋鬼和表现好一点的同学配对分开一样。

examination_example.sentence: For many men, the end of the workday is a time to kick <highlight>back</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对很多男人来说，下班后是放松的时候。

examination_example.sentence: Their home is also a place for kicking <highlight>back</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的家也是一个放松的地方。

examination_example.sentence: Whichever it is, you know every twist and turn like the <highlight>back</highlight> of your hand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不管是哪一种，你对每一个弯道都了如指掌。

examination_example.sentence: That is how we have put a giant target sign on the <highlight>backs</highlight> of American workers, Hagel says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是我们如何在美国工人的背上贴上一个巨大的目标标志的，哈格尔说。

sense_info_list.en: give support to someone or something with money or words

examination_example.sentence: One problem with the PreCheck program is the government's reluctance to <highlight>back</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: PreCheck项目的一个问题是政府不愿意支持它。

examination_example.sentence: Britain's public sentiment about the countryside is fully <highlight>backed</highlight> by the royal family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国公众对乡村的看法完全得到了王室的支持。

examination_example.sentence: Yet its report may well set <highlight>back</highlight> reform by obscuring the depth and breadth of the challenge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，它的报告可能会掩盖挑战的深度和广度，从而延误改革。

examination_example.sentence: When we come to think <highlight>back</highlight> on it, we can't remember the journey well because we didn't pay much attention to it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们回想起这段旅程时，我们记不太清楚了，因为我们没有太注意它。

examination_example.sentence: If you're breathing too hard to talk in complete sentences, <highlight>back</highlight> off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你呼吸困难而说不出完整的句子，后退。

sense_info_list.en: a player in a team game who plays behind the forward line of players
far from a central or main area

word_usage.usage:
表示“后面”
back指与“前面”相对的背面、后面，如人体、衣服等的背部，或建筑物等的后面、后部。
rear指物体、车辆、建筑物或位置的后面，常用于 at/to the rear (of sth)结构。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 向后地；往回地；倒回原处地；反向地；回溯；每况愈下地
n. 反馈的信息；反馈；反馈噪音；回授
adj. 向后的；智力迟钝的；羞怯的；犹豫的；线后的；落后的；倒退的

word_family.mean: n. 背；背部；背面；反面；后面；卫；剑桥大学后园；背后；椅背；船体

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 回顾过去；追忆；遭遇挫折；中途受阻
时光倒流；回到从前；守旧规

sense_info_list.en: in or to or toward a former location

examination_example.sentence: In the US, studies have shown that doubling the size of a road can simply double the traffic, taking us <highlight>back</highlight> to the starting point.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国，有研究表明，将道路的尺寸扩大一倍，只会使交通流量增加一倍，从而使我们回到起点。

examination_example.sentence: By offering instant discounts worth as much as $100, DeWalt launched a trade-in program to encourage people to bring <highlight>back</highlight> tools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 得伟公司推出了折价换新计划，为参与者提供高达100美元的即时折扣，鼓励更多人把旧工具送去回收。

examination_example.sentence: When customers do want to toss their pair, they can give them <highlight>back</highlight> to the store, which will repurpose and resell them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果确实不再使用，消费者可以将不要的衣物送还商店，商店会重新加工，再次售卖。

examination_example.sentence: Our philosophy with the island has always been, 'remove the threats and let the island go <highlight>back</highlight> to what it was'.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们对岛屿的理念一直是: 消除威胁，让岛屿回到原来的状态。

examination_example.sentence: This is the story of the little fox that has come <highlight>back</highlight>, and the people who have dedicated their lives to protecting it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个关于小狐狸重回故土，人们为保护它们而献身的故事。

sense_info_list.en: in or to a former time, state, or place

examination_example.sentence: Oil wells weren't drilled <highlight>back</highlight> then; they were essentially dug.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当时没有钻井；它们基本上是挖出来的。

examination_example.sentence: So when advertisers try to sell me ways to "turn <highlight>back</highlight> the clock", I have to suppress a laugh.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，当广告商试图向我推销“让时光倒流”的方法，我不得不抑制住笑声。

sense_info_list.en: give support to someone or something with money or words

examination_example.sentence: The krill industry wants to show it's a responsible player should instead be <highlight>backing</highlight> the protection of these huge tracts of the Antarctic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 磷虾商业应该支持对南极大片土地的保护。

examination_example.sentence: That won't stop inventors from dreaming up new ways to fly and trying to persuade investors to <highlight>back</highlight> their sometimes outrageous schemes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这不会阻止发明家们追求新飞行方式的梦想，他们还试图说服投资者支持那些有时看起来很离谱的计划。

sense_info_list.en: far from a central or main area

word_usage.usage:
（1）back作名词，表示较近的“后面，背面”，可用on the back of表达，注意定冠词the不可省。
示例：Write your name on the back of the cheque. 
把你的名字写在支票背面。 
（2）表示较远的“后面”，可用at the back of(范围之外)或in the back of(范围之内)表达。
示例：房子后面有一块菜园。
误 There is a vegetable garden in the back of the house.
正 There is a vegetable garden at the back of the house.
back作形容词，表示位置或方向时，指“后面的，往后的”；表时间时，指“过去的”“拖欠的”，此时back在句中只作定语，不用于比较等级。

back作副词时，表示“往后，在后面”，可引申为“恢复原状”；如果动词本身已表达“回到原状”的意思，不能再用back。
请把它还回去。
误 Please return it back.
正 Please return it.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 作为副词或形容词时, 强调所修饰物的位置以及动作运动方向。
可用于人或物, 指向后的, 落后的或迟钝的。
指成对并且分前后的东西的"后面的"。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 向后地；往回地；倒回原处地；反向地；回溯；每况愈下地
n. 支持者；赞助者；下（赌）注者
n. 反馈的信息；反馈；反馈噪音；回授
adj. 向后的；智力迟钝的；羞怯的；犹豫的；线后的；落后的；倒退的

word_family.mean: n. 背；背部；背面；反面；后面；卫；剑桥大学后园；背后；椅背；船体

sense_info_list.en: in or to or toward a former location

examination_example.sentence: "When they see that carrier <highlight>back</highlight> out on the street," Swig art said, "that's the fest sign to them that life is starting to recturn to normal."
examination_example.sentence_trans: “当他们看到快递员回到街上派送邮件，对于他们来说，这就是生活开始恢复正常的先兆了。”斯威格说。

examination_example.sentence: She goes <highlight>back</highlight> to Seoul every weekend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她每个周末都回首尔。

examination_example.sentence: Dating <highlight>back</highlight> to 1880, the most common living arrangement among young adults has been living with a romantic partner, whether a spouse or a significant other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 时间回溯到1880年，年轻人最常见的生活安排是与爱侣生活在一起，无论是配偶还是重要的另一半。

examination_example.sentence: In a bid to take production <highlight>back</highlight> to Detroit, Michigan lawmakers have introduced legislation that could make their state the best place in the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了让无人驾驶汽车生产回到底特律，密歇根州的立法者已经提出立法，该立法可能会使他们的州成为该国的最佳选择。

examination_example.sentence: Child put it <highlight>back</highlight> in the pan, saying, "But you can always pick it up and if you're alone in the kitchen, who's going to see it? "
examination_example.sentence_trans: Child 把它放回锅里，说：“但你可以把它捡起来，如果你一个人在厨房里，谁会看到呢？”

examination_example.sentence: Word got out that it was missing when someone asked to see the letter for research purposes, " and the intern put the letter <highlight>back</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当有人出于研究目的要求查看这封信时，就传出了它丢失的消息。于是实习生把信放了回去。

examination_example.sentence: Sue, who was born in the United States to immigrant parents, wants her peers to dial it <highlight>back</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 凯伦·苏出生在美国，父母是移民，她希望自己的同龄人们都能找回以前那个样子。

examination_example.sentence: The trouble with those things is that within six months to a year, people are <highlight>back</highlight> to their original baseline levels of well-being.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 问题是，在6个月到1年的时间里，人们又回到了最初的幸福基线水平。

examination_example.sentence: We found that for some lottery (彩票) winners who had won more than ￡500, 000 the positive effect was definitely there, but after six months to a year, they were <highlight>back</highlight> to the baseline.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们发现，对于某些中奖金额超过500英镑的彩票中奖者，肯定有积极作用，但是六个月到一年之后，他们又回到了基线。

examination_example.sentence: We need to bring <highlight>back</highlight> some balance. You don't want to wait until it's too late to do something.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要找回一些平衡，不能等到不可挽回时再采取行动。

sense_info_list.en: in or to a former time; state; or place

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Back</highlight> in 2016, the medium-sized city of Banjarmasin banned single-use plastic bags.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 早在2016年，中等城市班加马辛就禁止使用一次性塑料袋。

examination_example.sentence: Park Yeon Soo conceived (构想) this city of the future <highlight>back</highlight> in 1986. He considers Songdo his baby. Park sees himself as a visionary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 早在1986年，Park Yeon Soo 就构思了这座未来城市，他视松岛为自己的孩子，并认为自己是个预言家。

examination_example.sentence: You probably know about the Titanic, but it was actually just one of three state-of-the-art (先进的) ocean ships <highlight>back</highlight> in the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能知道泰坦尼克号，但它实际上只是当时最先进的三艘远洋邮船之一。

examination_example.sentence: Colleagues who don't trust one another will need to spend more time watching their <highlight>backs</highlight> than doing any useful work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 彼此不信任的同事会将更多的时间用于提防对方，而不是做任何有用的工作。

examination_example.sentence: These have a flat <highlight>back</highlight> with a rounded top, and are very heavy—they're light brown that look kind of cheap.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些(椅子)背部平坦，顶部呈圆形，并且非常重——它们是浅棕色的，看起来有点廉价。

examination_example.sentence: In the <highlight>back</highlight> room of the little bakery, his interest in design and his baking talent combined to work wonders—he shaped delicious masterpieces out of flour, butter and sugar.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这家小面包店的后房，他对设计的兴趣和他的烘焙天赋共同创造了奇迹——他用面粉，黄油和糖制作出了美味的杰作。

sense_info_list.en: give support to someone or something with money or words

examination_example.sentence: Though employers are <highlight>backed</highlight> by a chorus of remote work advocates, others note the loneliness, reduced productivity and inefficiencies of extended remote work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管远程工作倡导者异口同声支持雇主们，但其他人注意到长时间远程工作带来了孤独感、生产率下降和效率低下等问题。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Backing</highlight> this up, recent data show that passenger cars in the UK emitted 69 million tons of CO2 in 2015.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 能够支撑这一观点的是，近期数据显示：2015年英国乘用车排放了6900万吨的二氧化碳。

examination_example.sentence: PepsiCo's plan for its foods and drinks is based on guidelines from the World Health Organization, which last week <highlight>backed</highlight> using taxes on sparkling drinks to reduce sugar consumption.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 百事公司对其食品和饮料的计划是基于世界卫生组织(World Health Organization)的指导方针，该组织上周支持了使用对起泡饮料征税来减少糖的消耗的提案。

examination_example.sentence: So take a step <highlight>back</highlight>, switch off the automatic pilot and actually stop and reflect about things like our values and our relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以退一步，关掉自动驾驶仪，真正停下来反思我们的价值观和关系。

word_usage.usage:
（1）back作名词，表示较近的“后面，背面”，可用on the back of表达，注意定冠词the不可省。
示例：Write your name on the back of the cheque. 
把你的名字写在支票背面。 
（2）表示较远的“后面”，可用at the back of(范围之外)或in the back of(范围之内)表达。
示例：房子后面有一块菜园。
误 There is a vegetable garden in the back of the house.
正 There is a vegetable garden at the back of the house.

back作副词时，表示“往后，在后面”，可引申为“恢复原状”；如果动词本身已表达“回到原状”的意思，不能再用back。
请把它还回去。
误 Please return it back.
正 Please return it.
back作形容词，表示位置或方向时，指“后面的，往后的”；表时间时，指“过去的”“拖欠的”，此时back在句中只作定语，不用于比较等级。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 作为副词或形容词时，强调所修饰物的位置以及动作运动方向。
可用于人或物，指向后的，落后的或迟钝的。
指成对并且分前后的东西的"后面的"。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 回; 恢复; 在原处
后面; 后退; 向后(的)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 反馈的信息；反馈；反馈噪音；回授
adv. 向后地；往回地；倒回原处地；反向地；回溯；每况愈下地
n. 帮助；支持；后化；背衬；伴唱；护背；伴奏
adj. 向后的；智力迟钝的；羞怯的；犹豫的；线后的；落后的；倒退的

word_family.mean: n. 背；背部；背面；反面；后面；卫；剑桥大学后园；背后；椅背；船体

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 回顾过去；追忆；遭遇挫折；中途受阻
畏惧；犹豫；抑制；抑止；隐瞒
放回原处；推迟；拨慢(钟表指针)
收回；同意退货；使回忆起

sense_info_list.zh: 回; 恢复; 在原处

examination_example.sentence: When people try to interrupt you, have set hours planned and let them know to come <highlight>back</highlight> during that time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当有人试图干扰你时，你要做好时间规划，让他们知道要在特定时间再来找你。

examination_example.sentence: How will the woman get <highlight>back</highlight> from the railway station?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那个女人怎么从火车站回来？

examination_example.sentence: To get rid of it, I had to change to another channel and then change it <highlight>back</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了消除它，我不得不换到其他频道，然后再换回来。

sense_info_list.zh: 后面; 后退; 向后(的)

examination_example.sentence: I rode the bus with these crazy people who were laughing at silly jokes in the <highlight>back</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我和这些疯狂的人一起乘公共汽车，他们在后面听着无聊的笑话大笑。

examination_example.sentence: Some pieces of music can go for 40 minutes and require up to 50 page turns, including <highlight>back</highlight> turns for repeat passages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些音乐片段可以长达40分钟，需要多达50页的翻页，包括重复段落的向后翻页。

examination_example.sentence: Sitting <highlight>back</highlight> in the car on the way to the airport, I figured it all out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在去机场的路上，我坐在车里，想明白了一切。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Back</highlight> in 1978, I had to travel between three different campuses in the morning, teaching freshman composition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 回溯到1978年，我每天早上要往返于三个不同的校园，教新生作文。

examination_example.sentence: Stonehenge is one of the world's most famous prehistoric monuments dating <highlight>back</highlight> over 5, 000 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巨石阵是世界上最著名的史前遗迹之一，可以追溯到5000多年前。

examination_example.sentence: I was so excited when he wrote <highlight>back</highlight> to me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他给我回信时，我非常激动。

examination_example.sentence: A company representative wrote <highlight>back</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位公司代表回了信。

examination_example.sentence: You need a seat which supports your <highlight>back</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你需要一个能支撑你背部的座位。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 作为副词或形容词时，强调所修饰物的位置以及动作运动方向。
可用于人或物，指向后的，落后的或迟钝的。
指成对并且分前后的东西的"后面的"。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 背; 背部; 背面; 加背衬
后面的; 后面; 在背后; 向后

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 反馈的信息；反馈；反馈噪音；回授
adv. 向后地；往回地；倒回原处地；反向地；回溯；每况愈下地
n. 帮助；支持；后化；背衬；伴唱；护背；伴奏

word_family.mean: n. 背；背部；背面；反面；后面；卫；剑桥大学后园；背后；椅背；船体

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 回顾过去；追忆；遭遇挫折；中途受阻
带回；唤起（回忆）；使忆起；恢复；重新使用
回来；找回；取回；收回；恢复（原状）；回到；重提（原来的话题）；对…进行报复
重新开始；继续（已停止的工作）
袖手旁观；不采取行动；不参与
克制；阻止；隐瞒；犹豫；退缩；储备；抑制住；忍住（眼泪、笑声等）
背对着...；对…掉头不管；轻视；否认；抛弃
回电话；回拨；叫（某人）回来
退一步以便更客观地思考

sense_info_list.en: in or to or toward a former location

examination_example.sentence: The next day, even though his voice was coming <highlight>back</highlight>, he stayed quiet again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第二天，尽管他的声音恢复了，他还是保持沉默。

examination_example.sentence: His family moved <highlight>back</highlight> to the US when Mr. Bryant was in high school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 布莱·恩特上高中时，他的家人搬回了美国。

examination_example.sentence: Risking his life, Joe jumped <highlight>back</highlight> into the cold water and managed to drag (拽) his dad up onto some rocks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乔冒着生命危险跳回冰冷的水中，设法把他的父亲拖到岩石上。

sense_info_list.zh: 背; 背部; 背面; 加背衬

examination_example.sentence: He once put a sign that said "Sing to Me!" on my <highlight>back</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他曾经在我的背上挂了一个牌子，上面写着 "为我歌唱！"。

examination_example.sentence: Roy, a village boy, was trying to stand on a horse's <highlight>back</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 罗伊，一个村里的小男孩，当时正试图站在马背上。

examination_example.sentence: The tiger movements can reduce the pain in the <highlight>back</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老虎运动可以减轻背部的疼痛。

examination_example.sentence: They politely turn their <highlight>backs</highlight> on each other when they are eating food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们吃饭时礼貌地背对对方。

examination_example.sentence: I was to answer <highlight>back</highlight>, but from my mouth came "Not bad for a brave whale."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我正要回嘴, 但从我嘴里脱口而出: "对一条勇敢的鲸鱼来说, 这还不赖。"

examination_example.sentence: Did you call Michael <highlight>back</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你给迈克尔回电话了吗？

examination_example.sentence: Have you ever yawned in front of someone, only to have them yawn right <highlight>back</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你有没有在别人面前打呵欠，结果却让他们也马上打了个呵欠？

sense_info_list.zh: 后面的; 后面; 在背后; 向后

examination_example.sentence: While on the road, the moment you turn <highlight>back</highlight> with a smile is the most impressive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在路上的时候，你微笑着回头的那一刻是最令人印象深刻的。

examination_example.sentence: You can also pretend to hear your name called, turn <highlight>back</highlight>, and run your fingers through long hair.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你也可以假装听到叫你的名字，回头，用手指穿过长发。

examination_example.sentence: We may sometimes feel like there are certain things that are holding us <highlight>back</highlight> and stopping us from growing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们有时可能会觉得有某些东西在妨碍我们，阻止我们成长。

sense_info_list.en: in or to a former time, state, or place

examination_example.sentence: When you look <highlight>back</highlight> at your life in the future, will you have good memories of all the things that you did?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你将来回顾自己的生活时，你会对所有自己做过的事留下美好的回忆吗？

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Back</highlight> in the pioneer days, people grew their own food, caught their own fish, and collected their own water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 回到拓荒时代，人们自己种菜，捕鱼，取水。

examination_example.sentence: It dates <highlight>back</highlight> to ancient times.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这追溯到古代。

examination_example.sentence: All that was holding them <highlight>back</highlight> from running away from the camp was a small piece of rope—it was just tied to one of their legs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阻止他们逃离营地的只是一小段绳子——绑在他们的一条腿上。

examination_example.sentence: "I may have a disability," he says, "but I don't let it hold me <highlight>back</highlight> from anything."
examination_example.sentence_trans: “我也许有残疾”，他说道，“但是我不会让他阻止我做任何事”。

examination_example.sentence: Susan was tired of having her three children talk <highlight>back</highlight> to her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 苏珊十分厌倦她的三个孩子跟她顶嘴。

word_usage.usage:
（1）back作名词，表示较近的“后面，背面”，可用on the back of表达，注意定冠词the不可省。
示例：Write your name on the back of the cheque. 
把你的名字写在支票背面。 
（2）表示较远的“后面”，可用at the back of(范围之外)或in the back of(范围之内)表达。
示例：房子后面有一块菜园。
误 There is a vegetable garden in the back of the house.
正 There is a vegetable garden at the back of the house.
back作形容词，表示位置或方向时，指“后面的，往后的”；表时间时，指“过去的”“拖欠的”，此时back在句中只作定语，不用于比较等级。

back作副词时，表示“往后，在后面”，可引申为“恢复原状”；如果动词本身已表达“回到原状”的意思，不能再用back。
请把它还回去。
误 Please return it back.
正 Please return it.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，指与“前面”相对的背面、后面。作为副词或形容词时，强调所修饰物的位置以及动作运动方向。
指一个物体同其他物体的相对位置，多表示位置和方向的前后关系。
